- Draco Malfoy’s eyes flashed with anger when Hermione called him out. He spat back a cruel insult, igniting chaos among friends. Ron’s failed curse and Draco’s sneering laughter echoed as the tension shattered, leaving behind a storm of hurt, pride, and unspoken wounds.
- Draco Malfoy watched Harry's fear of Dementors with a cruel smirk, hiding his own trembling heart. - Draco Malfoy watched as Rita Skeeter’s slanderous articles spread chaos. He reveled in Harry’s heartbreak, knowing his words deepened the wounds. - Draco trained relentlessly, pushing himself to block curses silently. Guided by Bellatrix, he learned to shield his mind and wield the Protean Charm, but the shining light of a Patronus still eluded him. Every effort was a silent battle against his own fears and limitations.
- Draco Malfoy’s world was shifting. Gone was his carefree attitude; in its place, a restless tension grew. He ignored his duties, questioned his allies, and let distrust seep into his heart.
